https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/p0g0P6V3tFW7H0Vw2T52uVAImy0.jpg Podcaster Samantha Desouza is assigned to host a show that reunites lost loves. Even though Love is the last thing on her mind, Samantha falls for charming Jake who calls in with a problem. Will Samantha follow he heart this time? Chasing the One
